attributes.title: Grand Theft of Gus' Auto
attributes.caption: Minimations continues, with this premiere installment of "Straight Outta RT!"
attributes.description: Minimations continues, with this premiere installment of ""Straight Outta RT!"" Made by Rooster Teeth community GTA5 machinima team The Lone Few, this episode showcases the tale of Gus' car getting stolen, as well as FunHaus' Lawrence staycation at an "Air BnB." audio from Rooster Teeth Podcast #238 and Dude Soup #23

attributes.title: Halo Desynced - Combat Devolved
attributes.caption: ​In this installation of "Straight Outta RT", Gavin Free and Daniel Gruchy must deal with themselves from another dimension while surviving the horrors of being split apart!
attributes.description: In this installation of "Straight Outta RT", Gavin Free and Daniel Gruchy must deal with themselves from another dimension while surviving the horrors of being split apart! Made by Rooster Teeth community GTA5 machinima team The Lone Few.Includes audio from Rooster Teeth Podcast #322.

attributes.title: Cards Against Humanity Edition
attributes.caption: This week on "Straight Outta RT", we live through the crazy Cards Against Humanity scenarios played by the RT gang and special guests Game Grumps.
attributes.description:
This week on "Straight Outta RT", we live through the crazy Cards Against Humanity scenarios played by the RT gang and special guests Game Grumps. Like the clips you heard in this video Watch all of the hilarious moments in CAH with a Rooster Teeth sponsorship! On the fence No Problem! Try being a sponsor with a 30-Day trial!

Sign up here at: http://bit.ly/Become_A_Sponsor

Made by Rooster Teeth community GTA5 machinima team The Lone Few.

Includes audio from RT Sponsor Cut: Cards Against Humanity #1, #8, RTX2014 & RTX2015

attributes.title: Straight Outta RT
attributes.caption: Burnie swims for his life, as Gavin, Gus, and Brandon debate if he can make it back to shore. Meanwhile Geoff and Michael become top tier investigators, armed with their new truck technology.
attributes.description: Burnie swims for his life, as Gavin, Gus, and Brandon debate if he can make it back to shore. Meanwhile Geoff and Michael become top tier investigators, armed with their new truck technology. Made by Rooster Teeth community GTA machinima team The Lone Few.Includes audio from The Rooster Teeth Podcast #313 % Sunday Driving - How Muddy do You Like It

attributes.title: Off Topic Mountain Monsters
attributes.caption: This week on “Straight Outta RT”, Michael tells the tale of the legendary Mountain Monsters hunting team. Experience the terror of Bigfoot, The Mothman, and poor trigger finger safety!
attributes.description: This week on Straight Outta RT, Michael tells the tale of the legendary Mountain Monsters hunting team. Experience the terror of Bigfoot, The Mothman, and poor trigger finger safety!  Made by the Rooster Teeth community GTA5 machinima team:

attributes.title: Organ Zombie Apocalypse
attributes.caption: This week on “Straight Outta RT”, the zombie apocalypse has ravaged the planet! Jack, Adam, Bruce, Jeremy, and Ryan roam the planet looking for supplies, fixing cars, and trying to stay alive!
attributes.description: This week on ""Straight Outta RT"", the zombie apocalypse has ravaged the planet! Jack, Adam, Bruce, Jeremy, and Ryan roam the planet looking for supplies, fixing cars, and trying to stay alive!

attributes.title: El Trumpo
attributes.caption: On an On The Spot Edition of Minimations, we join Miles Luna and Shannon McCormick as they share the complex story of the one and only Donald Trump. Vengeance, Romance, and Twists? We have it all!
attributes.description: On an On The Spot Edition of Minimations, we join Miles Luna and Shannon McCormick as they share the complex story of the one and only Donald Trump. Vengeance, Romance, and Twists? We have it all!Made by the Rooster Teeth community GTA5 machinima team: The Lone Few.Includes audio from: On The Spot #27

attributes.title: Static Death and the Crime Switch
attributes.caption: ​Gavin ponders the inevitability of death, fearing that 'final resting place' might be more literal than once thought. Gavin also theorizes that being a criminal is simply a 'switch' inside one's self. Is he correct? Gus demonstrates!
attributes.description: Gavin ponders the inevitability of death, fearing that 'final resting place' might be more literal than once thought. Gavin also theorizes that being a criminal is simply a 'switch' inside one's self. Is he correct? Gus demonstrates! Featuring audio from: The Rooster Teeth Podcast #357,done by the community machinima team 'The Lone Few'!
attributes.display_title: Static Death and the Crime Switch

attributes.title: Stories for the Road
attributes.caption: The Podcast Crew shares their experiences with the terror that is the open road! Cars, bikes, cars hitting cars, cars hitting bikes, we've got it all on this episode of Minimations!
attributes.description: The Podcast Crew shares their experiences with the terror that is the open road! Cars, bikes, cars hitting cars, cars hitting bikes, we've got it all on this episode of Minimations!Made by the Rooster Teeth community GTA5 machinima team: The Lone Few.Audio from The Rooster Teeth Podcast #367

attributes.title: Gavin's Driving Dilemma
attributes.caption: ​Gavin finally explains his fear of driving in America: Deportation!
attributes.description: Gavin finally explains his fear of driving in America: Deportation!Made by the Rooster Teeth community GTA5 machinima team: The Lone Few.Audio from The Rooster Teeth Podcast #311

attributes.title: Deconstruction Crew
attributes.caption: It's metal against metal in an all-out bulldozer demolition derby! Gus, Burnie, Gavin, and Blaine witness the construction feud of the century!
attributes.description: It's metal against metal in an all-out bulldozer demolition derby! Gus, Burnie, Gavin, and Blaine witness the construction feud of the century!Made by the Rooster Teeth community GTA5 machinima team: The Lone Few.Audio from The Rooster Teeth Podcast #373
